title: My Werewolf Professor
description: My professor is a vicious animal, and he's hungry for me.All Bria Benton in college was to get as far away from her parents and her problems as possible. But what she gets is so much more.When she runs into her mysterious, sexy mythology professor in the hallway, she can't seem to stay away from him. She emails him late at night, stays after class, and even attends office hours more than anyone should. But some things start to not make sense. He almost doesn't seem... human.
author: Emilia  Rose
